attributes.action: Isle of Wight Ferry Day Return To Be 24 Hours Not Same Day.
attributes.additional_details:
A petition with one aim. For the islands ferry service providers to change there "day return" travel tickets to be valid for 24hours from time/date of purchase, not within same day travel.

A day is 24 hours rite ? So we are paying for a day return ?

Travelling out for short trips and returning early the following day sees a huge price difference from their period - day return prices.

Please sign and share this petition and get them to change there policies.

As I said before a day is 24 hours so lets have our tickets valid for just that.
